properties.Message:
⚠ NiFi ALERT DETECTED – RAM HIGH
Time
${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")}
RAM Metrics
Alert Type: RAM_HIGH
Metric: RAM Usage
Current Value: ${ramUsedNum}%
Threshold: 75%
Details: RAM usage exceeded recommended limits.
NiFi Monitoring System – Automated Alert Notification
properties.Subject: NiFi Alert RAM

  "timestamp": "${now():format('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}",
  "message": "If full, NiFi cannot track files, flows may break"
}

properties.Message:
⚠ NiFi ALERT DETECTED – LOW DISK (Content Repo)
Time
${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")}
Content Repository
Alert Type: DISK_LOW_CONTENT
Metric: Free Disk (Content Repo)
Current Value: ${diskContentRepoFreeNum:toNumber():divide(1024):divide(1024):divide(1024):format('0.00')} GB
Threshold: 10 GB
Details: Low content repo space may stop NiFi writes.
NiFi Monitoring System – Automated Alert Notification
properties.Subject: NiFi Alert DISK
